description:
Tree works subject to Canonbury No.2 TPO 1968 

 Works:  T65 and T66         Horse Chestnuts:   Crown thin T66 by 30%,                            concentrating on branches of                            lesser diameter.  Crown thin T65                            by approximately 15%.  Reduce                            length of trailers of both                            Chestnuts and remove minor                            epicormic growth from main trunk                            and limbs. 

         T64         Plane tree:        Crown thin 30% to give highway                            clearance.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
